projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: iOS Map Module: bump version to 2.0.4, add to titanium_mobile, update titanium_released
fields.summary: iOS Map Module: bump version to 2.0.4 and add titanium_mobile

comments.body:
map master PR: https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.map/pull/57
map stable PR: https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.map/pull/58

timob master PR: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/6171
timob 3_4_X PR: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/6172

titanium_releases master: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_releases/blob/master/titanium.json
titanium_releases 3_4_X: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_releases/blob/3_4_X/titanium.json

Verified fix on:

Mac OSX 10.9.5
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.4.0.201409231834
Titanium SDK build: 3.4.0.v20140925164115
Titanium CLI, build: 3.4.0-rc4
Alloy: 1.5.0-rc5
Xcode6.0.1
iPhone 5 (8.0)

Built an app to device that included the ti.map module, the module version used was 2.0.4 and the app ran as expected. Studio detects 2.0.4 as the latest and the correct files are present on my system.

Closing ticket.
